record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I now ask the Senate proceed to a period of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
